response.headline: Ryokan stay recommendation at Nagominoyado Hanagokoro in Japan with mountain views and traditional outdoor bath
response.summary: Sarah G stayed at Nagominoyado Hanagokoro ryokan in Japan, describing it as a splurge for a one-night stay but highly recommending it as a top activity. The ryokan features traditional outdoor baths with mountain forest views and lantern lighting.

extracted_text: Staying in a Ryokan in Japan
This was a little bit of a splurge for a one night stay, but was top of my list for things to do in Japan. I highly recommend.... more

visual_hierarchy: Traditional outdoor bath with mountain view
